INSTALL_MSG: You have successfully installed rice. Use the command carefully.
NAME: rice
SHORT: [p]rice and [p]countservers, [p]countusers, rice shows serverinfo and the content SHOULD be changed
DESCRIPTION: [p]rice can show basic serverinfo, however the command and it's content should be changed for each server, [p]countusers and [p]countservers is self explanatory. Explanation for changes are in the code
